name: Treasure Coast Flight Training
about: Treasure Coast Flight Training is a premier international flight academy located in Stuart, Florida, catering to students from around the world. We specialize in a wide range of pilot training programs, including Private Pilot, Instrument Rating, Single and Multi-Engine Commercial, and Flight Instructor certifications. Our state-of-the-art training facility features updated classrooms, computers, study areas, a dining area, and a Redbird FAA-approved simulator. We pride ourselves on fair prices, professional and respectful instructors, and a well-maintained fleet of aircraft. With both Part 141 and Part 61 training options and accelerated courses available, we prioritize student success and safety. Our campus also offers student accommodations, ensuring a comprehensive and supportive learning environment. We are committed to helping aspiring pilots achieve their career goals efficiently and safely.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating"]
